00035 typedef std::mt19937 rng_gen;  // Mersenne Twister
00036 
00041 rng_gen& get_generator();
00042 
00049 void init_random(int seed = -1);

00058 void gaussian_fill(ElMat& mat, El::Int m, El::Int n, DataType mean = 0.0f,
00059                    DataType stddev = 1.0f);
00065 void bernoulli_fill(ElMat& mat, El::Int m, El::Int n, double p = 0.5);

00095 
00096 template<typename DistType,typename DType=DataType>
00097 class rng {
00098 
00099   private:
00100     DistType m_dist; // Distribution type
00101 
00102   public:
00103   typename DistType::result_type gen() { return m_dist(get_generator()); }
00104     rng(){ }
00105     // bernoulli_distribution with prob p
00106   rng(DType p) : m_dist(p) {}
00107     // (uniform) real distribution between min/mean and max/stdev
00108   rng(DType a,DType b) : m_dist(a,b) {}
00109 };
00110 
00114 template <typename DType=DataType>
00115 void rng_bernoulli(const float p, DistMat* m) {
00116 
00118   float scale = 1. / (1. - p);
00119 
00120   //@todo: use seed from parameter
00121   rng<std::bernoulli_distribution,DType> myrn(p); //magic seed?
00122 
00123   for (int row = 0; row < m->LocalHeight(); ++row) {
00124     for (int col = 0; col < m->LocalWidth(); ++col) {
00125       m->Set(row,col,myrn.gen()*scale); //SetLocal?
00126     }
00127   }
00128 }
